item.description:
THE IRA”S SINGLES EVENTS

PRESENTS ON

COLUMBUS DAY WEEKEND

LEAF-PEEPING LIMO RIDE

SUNDAY, OCTOBER 10

A DAY FILLED WITH THE FOLLOWING:

( Can it get better than this?)


: Bloody Mary Cocktails



: A Ride in a 8 Passenger Stretch Limousine


: Back Road Leaf Watching/


: A Fantastic Lunch at:

Sweet Pea's Restaurant
6 Riverton Road (Rt. 20),
Riverton, CT 06065
860-379-7020
Check out the Food Menu
http://www.sweetpeasr...


DETAILS

DATE: SUNDAY, OCTOBER 10

TIME: 11:15

Place: The Gracious Home of Ira for the Delicious Bloody Mary/ Meet and Greet with your Limo Passengers . 44 Dibble Hollow Lane. Windsor Locks, CT 06096. 860-604-5792

The Ride/Restaurant. The Limo will pick us up at 12:00 P.M. A leisure ride thru Conn. Back roads. Arrive at Sweet Pea/Riverton around 12:45, walk this little town for a wee bit, and arrive at Restaurant at 1:00.

Leave the Sweet Pea at 2:15, arrive back to start point at 3:00 P.M.

Cost: $36.00, includes Limo Ride/Cocktails at Ira’s. Lunch is not included.

R.S.V.P: On or before October 3. Subject Line: Limo Ride. Mistrchrming@aol.com. I will send to you a Pay Pay Request for Payment.
item.name: The Ira- Leaf-Peeping Limo Ride/Bloody Mary/Sweet Pea Restaurant/Riverton
